document_data.name: Newt
document_data.mainbody: A '''newt''' was an aquatic amphibian, which included some [[salamander]]s, although not all aquatic salamanders were considered newts.

Varieties.Rough-skinned newt: A newt with warty skin and a long tail. It was not aggressive except to its natural prey, but inflicted a powerful toxin in its bite.{{Cite dragon/237/The Dragon's Bestiary: Venomous!|47}}

document_data.Usage: Older versions of the [[spell]] ''[[cloak of bravery]]'' required the brain of a newt as a [[material component]].
